description:

Apparently, the breakup with his girlfriend had left him strapped for cash, so he liked the idea of making some money by doing nude modeling.

He got a big smile on his face when I remarked about how big his cock was and after that he warmed right up. I love it when a straight guy slaps his big, hard dick back and forth on his legs, and Ross and I had some fun with that to break the tension.
Ross' big dick also shoots big loads. If you listen carefully, you can hear the sound of his cum (plunk, plunk, plunk) as it hits the table.
title: Ross
